CustomField.formula: value(IF(today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c >= 30 && today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c < 59, "1", (if(today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c >= 60 && today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c < 89, "2", (if(today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c >= 90 && today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c < 119, "3", (if(today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c >= 120 && today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c < 149, "4", (if(today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c >= 150 && today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c < 179, "5", (if(today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c >= 180 && today() - Eval_Request__r.Return_Date__c < 209, "2", ""))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Extension
